Name: The Village
About the game: The Village - is a combination of SNES / PS1 J-RPG style games (like Secret of Evermore, Illusion of Time, Chrono Trigger, FFVI...) and riddle game. In addition to the labyrinths and enigma (high difficulty), you will find all the elements specific to the J-RPG (various characters and faculties, farming, crafting...) to allow you to progress and finish your quest.
Meta Title: The Village: Jul 31, 2021, VW and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on The Village? Check out the release date (Jul 31, 2021), developer insights from VW, and a complete game summary.
